title: Roster
custom_preconds:
Compare with the web: http://m.reds.mlb.com/roster/40-man/

Attached files have different codes in case the data in PROD/QA is not consistent

custom_steps_separated.content: When we tap on More menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a Roster button

custom_steps_separated.content: When we tap on Roster
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a team picker
and tapping on the team will open that team's roster

custom_steps_separated.content: When we review the top header of the Roster page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will see a:
-Back button (Returning you to Team Picker)
-Segmented Controller to choose: Active | 40-Man 
-Sort button

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the Sort button on the top right
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the UI popover will appear under the Sort button:
-The header 'Sort roster by'
-Alphabetical 
-Position 
-Number

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on Active and taps on the Sort button and taps on Alphabetical
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the active roster will be listed in Alphabetical order

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on Active and taps on the Sort button and taps on Position
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the active roster will be listed and grouped by Position

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on Active and taps on the Sort button and taps on Number
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the active roster will be listed and grouped by Number
and players with no numbers will be listed at the bottom

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on 40-Man and taps on the Sort button and taps on Alphabetical
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the 40-Man roster will be listed in Alphabetical order

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on 40-Man and taps on the Sort button and taps on Position
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the active roster will be listed and grouped by Position

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on 40-Man and taps on the Sort button and taps on Number
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the active roster will be listed and grouped by Number
and players with no numbers will be listed at the bottom

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on Active or 40-Man and taps on the Sort button and taps any place other than the popover
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then UI popover is dismissed and the previous results are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a  Sort option (Number) and leaves the Team Roster and taps on another team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the new team is sorted by Number

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on 40 Man segment and views the bottom of the roster page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see a key indicating:
*   Not on Active Roster
** Not on 40-man Roster

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Roster 40-man Roster view
and a player is on the DL
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then user will still see the player on the 40-man Roster view
and will see a ** by players name
and see a 60-day DL label

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Roster 40-man Roster view
and a player is on the active roster
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The user will see the player on the 40-man Roster view
and will see a * by the players name

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Roster view
and views the positional groupings
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the following order:
Pitchers
Catchers
Infield
Outfield
Designated Hitter (if applicable)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the Roster view
and changes filters
and leaves the view and comes back
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the last used position/alpha filter

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Roster view on tablet

Full Screen Portrait
Full Screen Landscape
Wide (2/3) Landscape
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the roster will be group alphabetically by last name and will see columns:
Number (#)
Photo
Name (First Last)
B/T
Ht
Wt (lbs)
Birth Date
Age

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Roster view in  multitasking view

Split Landscape
Wide (2/3) Portrait
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the roster will be group alphabetically by last name and will see columns:
Number (#)
Photo
Player
B/T
Height
Weight (lbs)
Age

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the Roster view in multitasking view

Compact or Narrow (1/3) Portrait
Compact Narrow (1/3) Landscape
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the roster will be group alphabetically by last name and will see columns:
Number (#)
Player
B/T
Age

custom_steps_separated.content: When we tap a players name
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then verify that players cards opens
And information is displayed correctly
And information fits properly on screen
